house_listing.house_description: Need some repair.Extremely large home on corner lot.Has large beauty shop space in front.Side st. & A 1 car garage in the rear. Ideal for home business of most any kind. Call joe for more information. Special addendums apply.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Room, Colonial Style, Fenced, Foyer, Sun Room, Utility Room
